segments.text: Oh wow, I can’t believe what’s happening in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely overflowing, water pouring like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the mom’s right there, drying a plate, totally zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot’s in the water puddle— how hasn’t she felt that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there’s the boy, climbing on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching right into the cookie jar with the door wide open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool’s legs are spreading out; it’s tipping!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister’s just standing there, hand up for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re pulling off this heist behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden, nothing like the frenzy inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked high on the counter, waiting their turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is unexpectedly chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR
